reviews.review: einer der coolsten spiele dies gibt

I've originally played this game on Xbox and can't get enough of it. If you are looking for some really hard puzzle games, this is the game to purchase. A long game with a great story as well. There's so much to do after you've beaten the story. You can meet new people through Co-op and even build your own test chambers to play on! You won't regret buying this game. #1 best game ever.

On of the best puzzle games I have ever played. The game-play was so much fun, and the story/relationships with the characters are interesting. The only negative I had is how short the game was, 5 hours long, but that would not bother anyone, because the mechanics of the game-play is so simple, and allows for so many out of the box challenges. The only few games I passionately finished in less than 3 days. Masterpiece.

What I especially like about this game is that it's not just puzzle after puzzle, it's story based where there's no cut scenes of explanation. As a first person view character you truly live through the story. On the other hand I loved the puzzles and their steady increase in difficulty with uniqueness to how you have to think through them.

indirimlerde 1-5 arası oluyor indirimde en iyi fiyat eğlence oynu diğebilirim SLDFALSKFASLDKFLASDKFKL Artılar : 1 - Co-op Modunda Efsane Arkadaşınızla Eğlenebilirsiniz Tadından Yenmez. 2 - Oyun size öyle bir fizik sunuyoki gerçekten istediğiniz gibi masallah 3 - oyunda bölümler mükemmel final hours"da alabilirsiniz 4 - Oyun fazla Sistem istemiyor. Eksiler : 1 - Oyunda Hikaye Kısa Uzatabilir"ler. 2 - Portal 1 Tek Hikaye Sıkıcı Olmus neyse ilk oyunları 3 - portal 2"nin hikayesi güzel. ama portal 1 in baya kötü ve sıkıcı çok kolay. 4 - Portal"da buglar var fixlenebilir. ( Neyse iyi oyunlar oynu alın arkadaşlanızla oynayabilirsiniz. )
100% recommended!!
